name: search_wikipedia
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool wiki_briefs.
Tool description: Briefs about anything you search. No need to read lengthy articles, we summarize.
API description: Searches Wikipedia and returns the top K summarized information along with similar items. Additionally, images and coordinates with map links are provided when available.

q.description: Query string to search for on Wikipedia.

topk.description: Number of top summarized items to return. Defaults to 3. Must be greater than 0.
